title: Need critique on posters
content:
Hi everyone! I did a couple of compositions and I was thinking of maybe turning them into a series. The theme is celebrating the human spirit. I would also like to ask that should I get this project rolling, will I get in trouble for using the original images I based my work on? Thanks.

[http://dencii.deviantart.com/art/John-Lennon-in-Type-88812976](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725203404/http:/dencii.deviantart.com/art/John-Lennon-in-Type-88812976 "http://dencii.deviantart.com/art/John-Lennon-in-Type-88812976")  
 [http://dencii.deviantart.com/art/Martin-Luther-King-Jr-in-Type-108805541](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725203404/http:/dencii.deviantart.com/art/Martin-Luther-King-Jr-in-Type-108805541 "http://dencii.deviantart.com/art/Martin-Luther-King-Jr-in-Type-108805541")
author: Biinge

comments.content: I'd love to see those handlettered, with swashy curls and curves tangling into each other.

umm....... nice light & shade

i think ( dream) should be either more obvious.. or more hidden

depends on you

the size of the word seems strange

Very nice! It's so hard to say if you might get in trouble. You might want to consider taking a photo of someone in shadow yourself then no worries...it isn't like the photo would have to be excellent to achieve this effect.
